profileAlternative.name: Olivia Liao
profileAlternative.headline: Data Science at Stitch Fix, ex-Uber, Stanford, Biostatistics consultant
profileAlternative.summary:
Formerly Uber and Stanford. Experienced in building marketplace technologies, forecasting demand, developing and launching products worldwide.
Deep knowledge in adaptive clinical trial design and biomarker-guided clinical studies.
Interested in bridging between Data Science and Clinical Science.
